type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Entity Texture Overlay

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/entity_texture_overlay).

Overlays a texture over an entity's texture.

Type ID: `apugli:entity_texture_overlay`



---
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Entity Texture Overlay

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/entity_texture_overlay).

Overlays a texture over an entity's texture.

Type ID: `apugli:entity_texture_overlay`



---

texture_location.description: The texture to overlay onto the entity.
texture_location.markdownDescription: The texture to overlay onto the entity.

texture_url.description: If specified, the url to a .png file imported into the game as a texture for this power's use. This will be used as a fallback if `texture_location` is not specified or if a texture is not present.
texture_url.markdownDescription: If specified, the url to a .png file imported into the game as a texture for this power's use. This will be used as a fallback if `texture_location` is not specified or if a texture is not present.

show_first_person.description: Whether the texture overlay should show up in first person.
show_first_person.markdownDescription: Whether the texture overlay should show up in first person.

use_rendering_powers.description: Whether the power should have rendering powers such as `apoli:model_color` applied to them.
use_rendering_powers.markdownDescription: Whether the power should have rendering powers such as `apoli:model_color` applied to them.

render_original_model.description: Whether the original model of the entity should be rendered. Layers will remain untouched.
render_original_model.markdownDescription: Whether the original model of the entity should be rendered. Layers will remain untouched.

render_player_outer_layer.description: Whether the power will prevent the outer layer of the player from rendering.
render_player_outer_layer.markdownDescription: Whether the power will prevent the outer layer of the player from rendering.
